alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 10:59PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1059 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of I65 And AL 158 to Big Point. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Stapleton, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
